title: Curriculum Modeling the Dependence among Targets with Multi-task Learning for Financial Marketing. (arXiv:2305.01514v1 [cs.IR])
abstract: Multi-task learning for various real-world applications usually involves tasks with logical sequential dependence. tldr: 本文提出了一种依托多任务学习建模多个任务之间的逻辑依赖关系的模型，可以更好地优化网络，并暴露了在长路径序列任务中数据稀疏性和错误累积的问题。
en_tdlr: This paper proposes a model named "PIMM" which uses multi-task learning to model logical sequential dependence between tasks and applies it to financial marketing. The model addresses the issue of error accumulation and negative transfer in long-path sequential tasks, and takes into consideration of the sparsity of data through prior information merged model.
